Contributor: Auglay, artist.; Comité Central des Oeuvres de Guerre, publisher.; B. Sirven , printer.;
Description: Text in French tells of a "salon of humoristes" in Paris, an exhibit of the humorists. Illustration shows two enemies, perhaps German tied to a stone. Spears and rocks are being thrown towards both men.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Toulouse : Comité Central des Oeuvres de Guerre,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Salon des humoristes de Paris
